lead_paragraph: England goalkeeper Joe Hart recognises his Manchester City career is over for as long as Pep Guardiola is in charge and he is expecting to see out the season in Serie A with Torino.

headline.print_headline: Hart Recognises Man City Career Is Finished
headline.main: Hart Recognises Man City Career Is Finished

snippet: England goalkeeper Joe Hart recognises his Manchester City career is over for as long as Pep Guardiola is in charge and he is expecting to see out the season in Serie A with Torino....
